LanguageData.Bullet_GWBAdvancedWastelandRifle.label: wasteland rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_GWBAdvancedWastelandRifle.label: Advanced Wasteland Rifle
LanguageData.Gun_GWBAdvancedWastelandRifle.descriptio: The advanced issue weapon is an assault rifle with a full stock and modified internals. The rifle loosely resembles a SIG SG 551/553, and can mount a scope as seen with the Sniper's weapon.
